component.name: ThemedButton
component.script:
Sub Init()
print "ThemedButton:Init"
m.top.showFocusFootprint = true m.top.iconUri="" m.top.focusedIconUri=""
m.top.observeFieldScoped("width", "OnSizeChanged") m.top.observeFieldScoped("height", "OnSizeChanged")
m.focusedPoster = m.top.getChild(0) m.unfocusedPoster = m.top.getChild(1)
' Set the unfocused poster to the same as the focused poster, ' then change the blend color m.unfocusedPoster.bitmap = m.focusedPoster.bitmap m.unfocusedPoster.blendColor = "0x3C3C3CFF"
' Keep the label centered m.label = m.top.getChild(2) m.label.observeFieldScoped("horizAlign", "SetLabelAlignment")
' Watch for theme updates scene = m.top.getScene() themeChangeNotifier = scene.findNode("themeChangeNotifier") themeChangeNotifier.observeFieldScoped("title", "ThemeChanged")
End Sub
Sub OnSizeChanged()
print "ThemedButton:OnSizeChanged"
m.top.minWidth = m.top.width m.top.maxWidth = m.top.width
End Sub
Sub SetLabelAlignment()
print "ThemedButton:SetLabelAlignment"
if m.label.horizAlign <> "center" then m.label.horizAlign = "center"
End Sub
Sub ThemeChanged()
print "ThemedButton:ThemeChanged"
m.top.focusedTextColor = m.global.theme.textOnPrimary m.focusedPoster.blendColor = m.global.theme.primary
End Sub
